title: Tunic
medium:
Medium: silk, ceramic beads
Technique: printed
description: Two lengths of black silk stitched at shoulders to form tunic open at sides, knee length.  Printed in gold with archaic stylized repeat of falcons flanking a palmette, geometric border. Edged all around with black silk braid, on which are strung at intervals small brightly colored cylindrical ceramic "Mosaic" beads.
name: Tunic
